movie.title: 2nd Chance for Christmas
movie.description_intro: In a modern-day adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic A Christmas Carol, spoiled pop star, Chance Love, is forced to confront who she is, who she once was and the dismal fate that awaits her after trading love for fame and fortune long ago. These fateful glimpses into her life are guided by modern twists on the spirits of Christmas past, present, and future. Brian, Chance Love's faithful assistant, may just be his bosses saving grace.
movie.description_full: In a modern-day adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic A Christmas Carol, spoiled pop star, Chance Love, is forced to confront who she is, who she once was and the dismal fate that awaits her after trading love for fame and fortune long ago. These fateful glimpses into her life are guided by modern twists on the spirits of Christmas past, present, and future. Brian, Chance Love's faithful assistant, may just be his bosses saving grace.

movies.title: Edging
movies.summary: EDGING is a chamber dramedy about the brink of adulthood and how quickly it comes.
movies.description_full: EDGING is a chamber dramedy about the brink of adulthood and how quickly it comes.
movies.synopsis: EDGING is a chamber dramedy about the brink of adulthood and how quickly it comes.

movies.title: The Erotic Adventures of Anais Nin
movies.title_english: The Erotic Adventures of Anais Nin
movies.title_long: The Erotic Adventures of Anais Nin (2015)
movies.summary: A one-hour celebration of Anais Nin's ground-breaking diaries, this special programme brings the influential author's voice to the fore in a way not seen before on television. Shivani Kapur and Lucy Cohu star as Anais in dramatisations of different periods of her life, while Alix Wilton Regan plays the young polar-necked reporter, Leah, who helps uncover Nin's story. The drama is punctuated with commentary from high- profile fans, such as writer and broadcaster Rowan Pelling. Fascinating and racy, this documentary brings her work to life for a whole new generation.

movies.title: Nelly & Monsieur Arnaud
movies.summary: When Nelly, a woman being just divorced, meets by chance M. Arnaud, a mature salesman just retired, begins a strange and special relationship between the two personalities.
movies.description_full: When Nelly, a woman being just divorced, meets by chance M. Arnaud, a mature salesman just retired, begins a strange and special relationship between the two personalities.

movies.title: The Gourmet Detective A Healthy Place to Die
movies.title_english: The Gourmet Detective A Healthy Place to Die
movies.title_long: The Gourmet Detective A Healthy Place to Die (2015)
movies.summary: When Henry is invited as a guest speaker at a luxury resort spa, he quickly finds himself at the center of another murder. With Maggie at his side, our favorite duo must not only find the killer but be careful they don't become his latest victim.
movies.description_full: When Henry is invited as a guest speaker at a luxury resort spa, he quickly finds himself at the center of another murder. With Maggie at his side, our favorite duo must not only find the killer but be careful they don't become his latest victim.
